result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Javaris D Taylor

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Javaris D Taylor appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Javaris D Taylor.  Attorney Ryan Jay Michaels appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel requests a plea and sentencing hearing. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Javaris D Taylor. Student Intern Bailey Groh Rasmussen under the supervision of Attorney Katie Bakunowicz in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel has discovery and an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Javaris D Taylor.  Prosecuting attorney Katie Bakunowicz appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Defense counsel advises that they have received discovery and an offer from the state, but needs additional time to review with client. Case adjourned to Br 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. *Defense acknowledges receipt of the Information, waives reading and enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of his client.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris.  Katie Bakunowicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Status conference held. Defense counsel was recently appointed. Court finds CAUSE to adjourn the preliminary hearing.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor in court.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Status conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. The PD's Office needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court finds CAUSE to adjourn the preliminary hearing. Court orders matter adjourned for a status of counsel hearing in Branch 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor in court.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Status conference held.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. The PD's Office needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court orders matter adjourned for a status of counsel hearing in Branch 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Status conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Javaris D Taylor in court.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing.  Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. The PD's Office needs additional time to appoint counsel. Court finds CAUSE to adjourn the preliminary hearing. Court orders matter adjourned for a status of counsel hearing in Branch 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Status conference scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No Contact Order signed and filed.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Pretrial Order, signed and filed.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with SNG and J A.P C

DAR UNAVAILABLE DUE TO TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES.  CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD. Defendant Javaris D Taylor in court with attorney Thomas R. Reed.  Defendant Javaris D Taylor in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Javaris D Taylor appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer Branch 29.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
